ValidationRule.description: Require additional fields if Category = Network and Sub-Category = Firewall
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId <> '00e30000001kms9', ISPICKVAL( Category__c, "Network"), ISPICKVAL( Sub_Category__c , "Firewall"), ISBLANK ( Source_IP_Subnet_s__c ), ISBLANK ( Source_Port_s__c ), ISBLANK ( Destination_IP_Subnet_s__c ), ISBLANK ( Destination_Port_s__c ), ISBLANK ( Business_Justification__c ), ISBLANK ( Queue_ID_if_known__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please populate the following Focus Area fields when Category of Network and Sub-Category of Firewall is present: Source IP/Subnet(s), Source Port(s), Destination IP/Subnet(s), Destination Port(s), Business Justification, and Queue ID (if known)
